synopsis.text: Ashibe, a lively elementary school student, navigates the ups and downs of daily life alongside his extraordinary pet, a white sea lion named Goma-chan, in the heartwarming anime adaptation of Morishita Hiromi's charming 4-panel comic strip, originally published in Young Jump. Joined by a colorful cast of friends and family, this delightful duo frequently finds themselves in amusing predicaments, ensuring that there's never a dull moment in the world of "Shounen Ashibe (1991)".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
